entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
